member.name: COSERVERINFO
member.summary: Identifies a remote computer resource to the activation functions.

member.name: COSERVERINFO.dwReserved1
member.summary: This member is reserved and must be 0.

member.name: COSERVERINFO.pAuthInfo
member.summary: A pointer to a structure to override the default activation security for machine remote activations. Otherwise, set to NULL to indicate that default values should be used. For more information, see the Remarks section.

member.name: COSERVERINFO.dwReserved2
member.summary: This member is reserved and must be 0.
